issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
If you set the Duration between frames in Base UI> Views> Image Views> Animate to 0, the app unexpectedly quits.
 
Steps to reproduce:
1) Using KS 1.7.0 or KS 1.6.2, install on an Android device
2) Navigate to Base UI> Views> Image Views> Animate
3) Set duration to 0 ms
4) stop animation (to take the ms change)
5) Start animation

Result:
Dialog stating app unexpectedly quit

Expected Result:
Super fast animation

Notes:
Occurred on Droid, Nexus S, KS 1.7.0 and KS 1.6.2
fields.summary: Android: Kitchensink Base UI> Views> Image Views> Animated: Set Duration to 0 ms results in app stopping unexpectedly
fields.environment: Nexus S (2.3.2), Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105131803, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X r3ecace11, Also KS 1.6.2, Also Droid 1.

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer in use.
